summary: Inside Out 2 is a popular animated movie that came out in 2024. It's the second film in the "Inside Out" series, and it follows the story of Riley and her emotions. The film is about growing up and features a new set of emotions that want to take over Riley's head. It was made by Pixar and Disney, and it did very well at the movie theaters, making a lot of money and getting good reviews from critics. The movie is fun and exciting, with a great message about the ups and downs of growing up.
title: Inside Out 2
